name: Omprakash R Shete
headerTaglineFour: Microbiome Informatics Lab, IIIT Delhi, India

projects.title: Toward a Health-Associated Core Keystone Index for the Human Gut Microbiome
projects.description: Authors : Abhishek Goel, Omprakash Shete, Sourav Goswami, Amit Samal, Lavanya C.B., Saurabh Kedia, Vineet Ahuja, Paul W. O`Toole, Fergus Shanahan, Tarini Shankar Ghosh. Cell Reports, March 2, 2025. Analyzed ~45,000 gut microbiomes from 141 studies to rank 201 microbial taxa by stability, core presence, and health associations; validated findings on ~10,000 longitudinal samples and ~18,000 cross-sectional samples covering 28 disease conditions; established a framework for translating microbiome insights into dietary interventions and immunotherapy applications.

projects.title: Role of Gut and Urinary Microbiome in Children with Urinary Tract Infections: A Systematic Review
projects.description: Authors : Anjali Srivastava, Omprakash Shete, Annu Gulia, Sumit Aggarwal, Tarini Shankar Ghosh, Vineet Ahuja, Sachit Anand. Diagnostics (MDPI), January 3, 2025. Systematically reviewed gut and urinary microbiota profiles in pediatric UTI cases; identified microbial dysbiosis patterns associated with UTI pathogenesis; highlighted potential targets for microbiome-based preventive and therapeutic strategies.

projects.title: Normal Gut Microbiomes in Diverse Populations: Clinical Implications
projects.description: Authors : Omprakash Shete, Tarini Shankar Ghosh. Annual Review of Medicine, November 18, 2024. Surveyed 21,117 gut microbiomes from 65 studies across 29 countries and metadata from 221,983 samples spanning 71 countries; incorporated data from 410 interventional studies covering 15 major diseases; emphasized the critical role of global inclusivity in microbiome research to unlock its full therapeutic potential.

projects.title: Comparative Expression Analysis of Downy Mildew Resistant Grape Varieties
projects.description: ICAR-National Research Centre for Grapes, Pune (Aug 2021 - Mar 2022). Part of B.Tech Biotechnology dissertation; designed and executed RT-qPCR experiments to quantify gene expression in resistant vs. susceptible cultivars; hands-on experience with RNA isolation, cDNA synthesis, primer design, and data analysis.

projects.title: 4G Biomethane Production from Cactus
projects.description: College of Agricultural Biotechnology, Loni-Pravara (AVISHKAR), Nov 2019 - Mar 2020. Developed a second-generation biomethane production process using cactus biomass; presented research at AVISHKAR (state-level convention); gained proficiency in anaerobic digestion assays, gas chromatography, and bioprocess optimization.

projects.title: Social Entrepreneurship Development Volunteer
projects.description: ESTAH Society, Bengaluru (Jun 2020 - Aug 2020). Designed and facilitated entrepreneurship workshops for undergraduates; developed communication and teamwork skills through community outreach and event coordination; gained insight into social enterprise models and impact measurement.

services.title: Bioinformatics Consulting
services.description: We provide expert guidance on designing and implementing bioinformatics workflows using tools like Python, R, and various bioinformatics software to analyze molecular and microbiome datasets.

services.title: Metagenomic Profiling
services.description: We perform comprehensive metagenomic profiling, including data preprocessing, taxonomic classification, diversity analysis, and health association studies for microbiome research.

services.title: Molecular Biology Experimentation
services.description: We design and execute molecular biology experiments such as qRT-PCR assays, RNA isolation, cDNA synthesis, and agarose gel electrophoresis to generate reliable research data.

services.title: Statistical Data Analysis & Visualization
services.description: We conduct advanced statistical analyses and create publication-quality data visualizations to interpret complex biological datasets and support informed research decisions.

aboutpara: Omprakash Shete is a biotechnology and computational biology enthusiast with a strong background in molecular biology research. He has investigated downy mildew- responsive gene expression in grape hybrids and explored metagenomics and the human oral microbiome, leveraging Python, R, and bioinformatics tools to integrate wet-lab and computational approaches. Passionate about applying computational methods to complex biological problems, he stays current with advancements in the field and enjoys collaborating on multidisciplinary research.
